title: Artist’s Duplex Haven in Swidnica’s Historic Heart — Green Living Redefined
description: Welcome to a breathtakingly renovated three-level duplex boasting 156 sqm of sunlit living space, brimming with sustainable elegance in Swidnica’s Historic Center. Discover three spacious bedrooms and three designer bathrooms seamlessly blending old-world charm with modern ecological touches. The living area is cocooned by rich wooden textures, anchored by a fireplace and a direct walkout to a private, greenery enclosed barbecue zone — perfect for al fresco dining under mountain-kissed skies.
neighborhood_description: Step outside your quiet enclave into Swidnica’s thriving Historic Center: a mosaic of cobbled streets lined with cafes, galleries, and artisan shops. Here, the business district, esteemed schools, and rolling mountain vistas are just moments away. Public transit and nearby highway access make city exploration and commutes effortless.
lifestyle_benefits: outdoor entertaining for family and friends
close to nature reserves and mountain hikes
target_buyer: Ideal for eco-conscious professionals, creative families, or anyone seeking a blend of historic intrigue and sustainable sophistication near the heart of Swidnica.
market_positioning: A rare fusion of historic architecture and eco-minded renovation, positioning this duplex at the high end of Swidnica’s urban market for sustainably oriented buyers who value both character and progress.
